sentences: Grenique Roshawn Harper (born November 13), simply known as Grenique is an American R&B soul singer.
Two weeks before her 22nd birthday Kedar Massenberg the president of Motown alongside Chico DeBarge signed her to Motown.
She gave background vocals on Alyson Williams album "It's About Time" and later on in 2008 Grenique co-written The Game song "Game's Pain".
